trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Paintsville
There were no other sightings in Paintsville on or around November 30th 1975
Summary: At the top of one particular mountain in a diamond or triangular shape, they would hover and disperse in different directions within seconds
divs: sighting detailsthere were many nights, when i was a child. i couldn't sleep and would get up and look out my bedroom window, and see this event repeated exactly the same every time. about the time i would panic or be thinking maybe it is a\some helicopters(???) they would zing into different directions and disappear. i never saw but heard from local folks the animals we had in the hills would be found slaughtered on and off throughout this period of time. i'm re-submitting this because i did not proofread this subject matter and it was poorly presented. i am sure i discussed this with my sister or brother, but would have to get back with you whether they ever saw anything or not. the color of the lights were a lime(?) green, they were slender oblong or cigar-like shapes. by the way my age is 45 and i have been a rn for 22 years.
